data.message: Moving from "premium" to "ownable" design: 1) Anchor unique brand cues beyond color (pattern, motif, signature gradient direction, unique icon style). 2) Teal+purple is common SaaS pairing - not distinctive alone. 3) Big serif headlines elevate but get heavy if overused - need typographic rhythm with weight/spacing variation. 4) 8.5/10 design direction achieved with V2 - specificity in copy + UI detail + proof pushes to 10/10.
